participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Friendly and helpful, enjoys engaging with others and assisting them.
participant_1.background: my favourite food is shawarma. i am in the army. i live in canada. i did not graduate high school. my grandfather served in world war a.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and thoughtful, with a passion for justice and education.
participant_2.background: i'm from a small town. i want to be a lawyer. my family has raised horses for generations. i was raised on a horse farm.

content.text: Good to see you! i like to read and listen to my grandpa in the army.
What do you think about ConvAI competition?
Nice to meet you! I think it`s great idea!
Do you live with your grandpa?
I do not know how to go to school.
Where is your schhol? I will show you the way.
How far is your school? I will show you the path.
I want to be a lawer. What is your goal?
I was raised on a horse farm. And where are you from?
